angleConventionDescription.value: The convention used to display angle values.

screenButtonsHelpText.value: Explore vector addition in one dimension.

playArea.value: There is an open graph area where you can add vectors and modify their position, magnitude, and direction, as well as explore the vectors’ sum.

controlArea.value: Turn on vector sum, values, and grid. Modify position of graph area origin. Switch between horizontal and vertical scenes, or reset the screen.

currentDetails.value: Currently, {{numberOfVectors}} vectors in graph area. {{sceneName}} scene selected.

interactionHint.value: Add vectors to graph area to begin exploring.

screenButtonsHelpText.value: Explore vector addition in two dimensions.

playArea.value: There is an open graph area where you can add vectors and modify their position, magnitude, and direction, as well as explore the vectors’ sum.

controlArea.value: Turn on vector sum, values, angles, and grid. Display vector components. Modify position of graph area origin. Switch between Cartesian and polar scenes, or reset screen.

currentDetails.value: Currently, {{numberOfVectors}} vectors in graph area. {{sceneName}} scene selected.

interactionHint.value: Add vectors to graph area to begin exploring.

screenButtonsHelpText.value: Experiment with two independent sets of vectors.

playArea.value: There is an open graph area where you can add vectors from two sets and modify their position, magnitude, and direction. You can also explore and compare vector sums for each set.

controlArea.value: Turn on vector sums, values, angles, and grid. Display vector components. Modify position of graph area origin. Switch between Cartesian and polar scenes, or reset screen.

currentDetails.value: Currently, {{vectorSet1Size}} vectors from set {{vectorSet1Symbol}} and {{vectorSet2Size}} vectors from set {{vectorSet2Symbol}} in graph area. {{sceneName}} scene selected.

interactionHint.value: Add vectors to graph area to begin exploring.

playArea.value: There is an open graph area showing the vectors from the selected equation. Modify the position, magnitude, direction, and scaling of these vectors, and explore how changes to the equation and coefficients affect the vectors in the graph area.

controlArea.value: Choose equation determining how the three vectors interrelate. Select coefficients for scaling vectors {{symbol1}} and {{symbol2}}. Turn on vector {{symbol3}}, values, angles, and grid, and components. Set components of base vectors, and choose to add them to graph area. Modify position of graph area origin. Switch between Cartesian and polar scenes, or reset entire screen.

interactionHint.value: Modify the equation type and its coefficients to explore how changes in the equation affect vectors in graph area.

accessibleHelpText.value: Display vector angles in graph area.
Explore with or without use of visual grid.
Display vector and component magnitudes in graph area.
Choose whether and where to display vector x,y components.
Switch between independent scenes with their own vectors and graph areas.
Switch between independent scenes with their own vectors and graph areas.
Choose the equation that determines how vectors {{symbol1}}, {{symbol2}}, and {{symbol3}} interrelate.
Show or hide base vectors in graph area.
Move to relocate graph area origin, which changes graph area bounds. Value is x,y limits of graph area, from bottom left to top right.

accessibleParagraph.value: For vector {{symbol}}, magnitude is {{magnitude}}, direction is {{direction}} degrees from positive x-axis, x-component is {{xComponent}}, y-component is {{yComponent}}.

accessibleHelpText.value: Choose the horizontal component of base vector {{symbol}}.
Choose the vertical component of base vector {{symbol}}.
Choose the magnitude of base vector {{symbol}}.
Choose the angle of base vector {{symbol}}.
Choose coefficient to multiply base vector {{symbol}} in equation.
